title: Courtyard and maq'ad of al-Sultan Qaitbai's house (aka Bayt al-Razzaz)
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Maison du Sultan Kaïtbaï dans le haret el Mârdâni, Caire. Translation of photographer's description: House of Sultan Kaïtbaï in the haret of el Mârdâni, Cairo. Collector's note: Comité.
location: Ad Darb al Aḩmar; Cairo; Egypt
architectural-detail: arches; columns; doors; exterior walls; loggias; mashrabiya; meshrebeeyehs; muqarnas
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Courtyard and maq'ad of al-Sultan Qaitbai's house (aka Bayt al-Razzaz)
